messages.content: Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What general information is recorded in the fire?
General information includes year, month, day, time, and stages like inception, marking, announcement, intervention, partial control, resurgence, repayment, and full extinguishing.
Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What is the responsibility of the forest service in the fire?
The responsibility of the Forest Service is detailed in the bulletin and includes managing fire response and ensuring coordination with other services and stakeholders.
Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What is recorded under the starting point of the fire?
The starting point includes regional information, municipality or community, area-location, longitude, latitude, and altitude.
Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What is recorded under the starting position of the fire?

The starting position includes details such as grove, forest, woodland, agricultural area, grassland area, reed-swamps, populated area, agricultural facility, livestock facility, garbage-landfill, industry-craftsmanship, or road slopes.
Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What are the possible causes of fire?
Possible causes of fire include physics, arson with intent, arson by negligence, lightning strike, waste incineration, malicious actions, spark machinery, and burning of crop residues.
Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What is recorded about the area burnt in the fire?
The area burnt includes forests, swamps-reeds, woodland, agricultural lands, groves, crop residues, grasslands, and other lands, with totals calculated in acres.
Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What information is recorded about the rescue of people?
The rescue of people includes details such as full name, capacity, age, and cause of the rescue situation.
Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What forces are involved in firefighting?

Forces involved include permanent and seasonal fire officers, walking departments, volunteer firefighters, armed forces personnel, municipal staff, club members, and individuals with personal work requests.
Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What investment instruments are included?
Investment instruments include firetrucks, tankers, firefighting vehicles from other services, and various machines and portable tools.
Onto-Engine is a professional assistant specializing in ontology engineering.
What methods of deposit are recorded in firefighting operations?
Methods of deposit include by aerial means, self-extinguishing, with ground sections, or with pedestrian sections. Use of backfire or incineration, water, foam, and retardants is also tracked.
